articles.author: Georg Szalai
articles.title: AI Replaces ‘Mamma Mia!’ Musical Star Sara Poyzer for BBC Production: “Sobering” - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "We feel that AI is a danger to the whole industry," said Voice Squad, a voiceover agency working with Poyzer who shared the news on social media.
articles.content: The AI debate has intensified in the U.K. this week after veteran Mamma Mia! musical star Sara Poyzer in a social media post said that artificial intelligence has replaced her for a BBC production. … [+1991 chars]

articles.title: King sends 'hand of friendship' recorded message - BBC.com
articles.description: King Charles is sending an audio message about caring for others to this year's Maundy Thursday service.

articles.title: Kate 'will be thrilled', Queen Camilla says to well-wishers - BBC.com
articles.description: Queen Camilla spoke to well-wishers five days after the Princess of Wales revealed her cancer diagnosis.
